title: Enhancing Mathematical Thinking and Real-World Problem-Solving Skills Through Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts (arithmetic, elementary statistics)
context.additional_context: Blended environment combining a smartphone-based online learning platform with monthly offline meetings. Most learners are working professionals or community activists who recognize the need to solve real-life problems using mathematical tools.

learning_goals: Through PBL activities, learners can apply three or more mathematical modeling techniques to analyze community problems and propose solutions
In team-based collaboration processes, learners can write self-assessment reports while receiving weekly progress feedback
At the end of the six-month course, learners can compile PBL output portfolios and explain key results in a 15-minute presentation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
